title: Lauren Shares Her Magical Birthday, and Sheena Melwani Brings Pure Joy
description:
Lauren is back to catch you up on her amazing birthday weekend! She talks about seeing Harry Potter on the Broadway stage, while reminding us not to be during a live performance.
And later, Lauren talks with Sheena Melwani, singer/songwriter, TikTok superstar and creator of the "Real Indian Dad" series. Sheena talks about her path to finding success in a way she never saw coming, and eventually revealing the identity of Real Indian Dad (who for the record is her husband, not her father). 

Watch the podcast on YouTube: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyYT

Watch the podcast on IG: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyIG


Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyPodcast

Follow Lauren on Twitter
